Tutorial template

important

This template includes writing instructions and boilerplate text that you can customize, use as-is, or completely replace with your own text. This text is indicated in [square brackets]. Make sure you replace the placeholders with your own text. This admonition should be deleted.

In this tutorial, you'll see how to [insert brief description of the main tutorial task]. This tutorial is intended for [audience]. It assumes you have knowledge of:

  • Concept 1
  • Concept 2
  • Concept 3

By the end of this tutorial, you'll have seen how to:

  • Learning objective 1
  • Learning objective 2
  • Learning objective 3

  • [product] provides many of the same features as [competitors], but with [feature], you can...
  • Using [feature] enables you to [pain point]...

  • Access codes to obtain. ]

Before you start the tutorial, you should:

  • Prerequisite 1
  • Prerequisite 2
  • Prerequisite 3
